title: Practical AI-Based Language Education: Exploratory Research and Workplace Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Analysis of Innovative Language Education Cases Using AI Tools and Exploration of Ethical Considerations

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ethical principles for using AI-based language education tools.
Learners can analyze AIED (Artificial Intelligence in Education) implementation cases using exploratory research methodologies.
Learners can develop AI-integrated instructional designs tailored to workplace environments through project-based assessments.
Learners can establish learner-customized AI tool integration strategies based on survey results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
